name: The Majestic Agra
description:
Tour
the cozy corners of the city of Taj where
old-world charm meets a youthful downtown vibe. Taste mouth-watering
eats
from undiscovered spots that specialize in traditional recipes and century-old
techniques.
Walk down the streets while visiting the famous sites built by the Mughals.
Learn about the colourful history of the city and explore its dark and seedy
past.
